title: SNOT Adds Two Colorado Dates To Their 2025 Reunion Shows
description: So far they're up to eight shows.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
excerpt: So far they're up to eight shows.
text: Snot is now up to eight reunion shows in 2025, as they've added two dates in Colorado – April 25 at HQ in Denver, and April 26 at The Black Sheep in Colorado Springs. As for who's fronting Snot these days after the passing of Lynn Strait, we'll find out at their show at the House Of Blues Anaheim in Anaheim, CA on January 17. Snot originally existed between 1995 and 1998, up to the death of Strait. Snot released one album – Get Some in 1997 – as well as a tribute album in 2000 called Strait Up featuring Ozzy Osbourne, Serj Tankian of System Of A Down, Jonathan Davis of Korn, Max Cavalera of Soulfly, Fred Durst of Limp Bizkit, and way more. Snot in 2025 is guitarists Mikey Doling and Sonny Mayo, bassist John "Tumor" Fahnestock, and drummer Jamie Miller alongside the mystery vocalist. Snot's 2025 tour dates thus far are as follows. 1/17 Anaheim, CA House Of Blues Anaheim (w/ Adema & Sicksense)1/18 San Diego, CA Brick By Brick (w/ Adema & Sicksense)2/8 Santa Barbara, CA SOhO (w/ Seven Hours After Violet & Petmedz)4/25 Denver, CO HQ4/26 Colorado Springs, CO The Black Sheep5/18 Daytona Beach, FL Welcome To Rockville8/8-10 Kortrijk, BEL Alcatraz8/14-17 Carhaix, FRA Motocultor Festival Want More Metal? html:
Snot is now up to eight reunion shows in 2025, as they've added two dates in Colorado – April 25 at HQ in Denver, and April 26 at The Black Sheep in Colorado Springs. As for who's fronting Snot these days after the passing of Lynn Strait, we'll find out at their show at the House Of Blues Anaheim in Anaheim, CA on January 17.

Snot originally existed between 1995 and 1998, up to the death of Strait. Snot released one album – Get Some in 1997 – as well as a tribute album in 2000 called Strait Up featuring Ozzy Osbourne, Serj Tankian of System Of A Down, Jonathan Davis of Korn, Max Cavalera of Soulfly, Fred Durst of Limp Bizkit, and way more. Snot in 2025 is guitarists Mikey Doling and Sonny Mayo, bassist John "Tumor" Fahnestock, and drummer Jamie Miller alongside the mystery vocalist.

Snot's 2025 tour dates thus far are as follows.

1/17 Anaheim, CA House Of Blues Anaheim (w/ Adema & Sicksense)
1/18 San Diego, CA Brick By Brick (w/ Adema & Sicksense)
2/8 Santa Barbara, CA SOhO (w/ Seven Hours After Violet & Petmedz)
4/25 Denver, CO HQ
4/26 Colorado Springs, CO The Black Sheep
5/18 Daytona Beach, FL Welcome To Rockville
8/8-10 Kortrijk, BEL Alcatraz
8/14-17 Carhaix, FRA Motocultor Festival
